name: W Bangkok
address: 106 North Sathorn Road, Silom, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500
description: W Bangkok fuels travel appetites with its proximity to the BTS Station for easy access to the rest of the city. Cruise down the Chao Phraya River and take in the sights and sounds of Bangkok. Premier shopping outlets like ICONSIAM and Siam Paragon are within minutes of our 5-star hotel in Sathorn, Bangkok, while spiritual sanctuaries like the Temple of Emerald Buddha and Wat Pho offer quiet retreats. Dive into history at The Grand Palace or dine at our very own The House on Sathorn, a national heritage site, now one of the premier restaurants in Bangkok. The House on Sathorn is known for its modern Thai seafood cuisine. The WET® Deck serves up cocktails and quick bites by the pool. Unwind in our hotel in Bangkok, Thailand's AWAY® Spa or sweat it out in our FIT gym. Host your next meeting in a magnetic venue like the Great Room. Our Whatever/Whenever® service means you get what you need when you need it. The stylish, vibrant rooms and suites make your stay at W Bangkok a memorable one.Marriott

name: The Athenee Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Bangkok
description: Modern yet inspired by Thai culture, with thoughtful touches in every design decision, The Athenee Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Bangkok is rooted in authentic experiences. Situated in Sukhumvit, one of the most central districts of Bangkok, guests are steps from the Skytrain connecting directly to premium shopping malls and local attractions. Built on the grounds of Kandhavas, the palace of Princess Valaya Alongkorn, daughter of King Rama V, our Bangkok five-star hotel encapsulates elegance and allure. Whether you are savoring curated menus at one of our eight restaurants, indulging in holistic treatments at Athenee Spa, floating in our free-form rooftop pool or enchanting guests from eco-friendly venues, unsurpassed experiences await on Wireless Road. Reserve a pet-friendly room styled after Thai epochs at our luxury hotel in Sukhumvit, or select a suite offering butler services such as private check-in, shoe shining and a personal shopper. The Athenee Hotel welcomes you to Bangkok with distinction.Marriott

name: Mövenpick Hotel Sukhumvit 15 Bangkok
description: Located in the heart of Bangkoks Central Business District. The hotels key features are its personalized service, and comfortably appointed accommodation with 363 rooms, surround lush tropical foliage replete with cascading waterfall, hanging gardens and an iconic central Plumier Lelawadee tree. Also featured is an elegant all day dining restaurant with live cooking station preparing beautiful Thai and international delicacies and a breathtaking rooftop bar and pool offering panoramic views over Bangkok.accorhotels.com

name: Sheraton Grande Sukhumvit, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Bangkok
description: Experience unrivaled luxury and sophistication at Sheraton Grande Sukhumvit, a Luxury Collection Hotel, ideally located on Sukhumvit Road. With direct access to the BTS SkyTrain and close proximity to the MRT station, the city’s best experiences and tourist attractions are only a few stops away. Escape the bustling city life and enter a world of serenity at our free-form swimming pool and The Grande Spa. Indulge in a world of culinary delights from the finest local authentic flavors to delectable international cuisines at our award-winning restaurants that promise an unforgettable culinary experience. Our 420 spacious guest rooms and suites showcase the essence of local culture with a luxurious twist and our latest technology and connectivity, ensure you stay up to date and connected with loved ones or business clients. Discover the pinnacle of luxury Bangkok hotels at the Sheraton Grande Sukhumvit, where every moment is an exquisite revelation.Marriott

name: Ploykhumthong Boutique Resort
description: PloyKhumThong Boutique Resort is a 10-minute drive away from Suvarnabhumi Airport. Offering modern air-conditioned rooms, the resort features free Wi-Fi. The resort is a 5-minute drive to The Paseo Shopping Avenue and Ladkrabang Airport Rail Link Station. It is a 10-minute drive to King Mongkut's Institute of Technology Ladkrabang. Mahanakorn Floating Market is a 15-minute drive away. Colourful rooms at PloyKhumThong Boutique Resort are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV and a refrigerator. An en suite bathroom comes with shower facilities. Tours and air tickets can be booked at the tour desk while laundry service and currency exchange can be arranged at the 24-hour front desk. Guests can enjoy a great selection of international dishes at the resort’s restaurant.

name: The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality
description: Located in Bangkok, 1.5 km from Emporium Shopping Mall, The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The property features a snack bar, as well as a restaurant serving American cuisine. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. At the hotel each room is fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality offers certain rooms with city views, and the rooms have a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options. The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality offers a terrace. Central Embassy is 4.7 km from the hotel, while Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 28 km from The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality.

name: Night Hotel Bangkok - Sukhumvit 15
description: A 5-minute walk from Sukhumvit MRT station and Asok BTS station, Night Hotel Bangkok is located on Sukhumvit 15. It offers a rooftop swimming pool and rooms with 42-inch flat-screen TVs. Free WiFi access and parking are available. Night Hotel Bangkok is Pet-Friendly. The stylish rooms at Night Hotel Bangkok are spacious and come with modern décor. Each room features Egyptian bed-sheet cotton and allergen-free pillows. Other amenities include a filled minibar, tea&coffee making with boiler and bathroom amenities on-demand. The hotel offers laundry and dry cleaning services. Currency exchange services are also available. Flava Restaurant offers views of Bangkok city, and serves up a wide spread of Italian and Thai dishes. The Flava Lounge provides a comfortable venue for guests to sip their cocktails. Night Hotel Bangkok is 25 km from Suvarnabhumi Airport and Don Mueng Airport. Walking distance 450 metres from Terminal 21 and Robinson Shopping Malls. Arnabhumi Airport is 31.1 km from the property.

name: Le Méridien Bangkok
description: Stimulate your senses at Le Méridien Bangkok, an award-winning, art-inspired, five-star hotel in Bangkok, Thailand's exhilarating capital. Set on Surawong Road in the Silom business hub, our high-end hotel is steps from the vibrant Patpong Night Market, celebrated nightlife and Samyan Mitrtown. Access the best of Bangkok via the nearby Sala Daeng BTS and Sam Yan MRT stations. Ground your getaway in luxury, sipping cocktails beside our hotel's outdoor pool overlooking the iconic Mahanakhon building. Get pampered at the world-class spa and sustain yourself with curated local Asian and European cuisine. Visiting Bangkok for a destination wedding or corporate gathering? Our Silom, Bangkok hotel's versatile venues include a ballroom with a nine-metre ceiling alongside state-of-the-art meeting rooms. After each enriching day in Silom, retire to your plush sanctuary and watch the sunset over Bangkok's gilded temples and jagged skyscrapers. Savor the good life in this storied city at Le Méridien Bangkok.Marriott

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Sukhumvit Bangkok
description: Begin your stay at the inviting DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Sukhumvit Bangkok with a warm welcome and a delicious chocolate chip cookie upon arrival. Set in the heart of Bangkok’s major business, leisure and entertainment districts, the contemporary Bangkok hotel is close to The Emporium leisure complex and the lush Benjasiri Park and offers easy access to the Phrom Pong BTS Skytrain Station, the Expressway and Airport. All of the stylish, light and airy guest rooms at this Bangkok hotel are tastefully decorated using muted, contemporary colors and natural wood accents and offer LCD TVs and wired and wireless internet access. Upgrade to a luxurious suite for additional space and amenities. Plan your business or social event at this Bangkok hotel with a variety of flexible space available, all of which feature WiFi and the very latest in audio/visual equipment. Food lovers at this modern hotel in Bangkok will be spoiled for choice in our relaxed diner where you can savor Thai, Vietnamese and Western dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Sip cool drinks and enjoy western and Thai grilled specialties while you listen to music by live DJs in our casual poolside bar, Grillz. Keep fit in the complimentary 24-hour fitness center, or cool down with a dip in our rooftop infinity swimming pool, offering unparalleled views over the city.Hilton

name: Riva Surya Bangkok
description: Located on the charming Phra Arthit Road, Riva Surya Bangkok offers stylish air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel is equipped with a fitness centre and two swimming pools for adults and kids. The property is a 5-minute walk to Khao San Road and a 10-minute walk to The Bangkok National Museum. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 1 hr drive away. Tastefully furnished with contemporary decor, rooms at Riva Surya feature a flat-screen TV, an iPod docking station and a safety deposit box. A minibar and an electric kettle are provided. Free toiletries and a bathrobe are included in an en suite bathroom. Some rooms come with a private balcony. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with laundry services and safety deposit box. Other conveniences include an on-site tour desk and free private parking. Guests can also enjoy the stunning views of the river from the restaurant on site. With indoor and outdoor dining options, the babble & rum Restaurant daily serves diverse and delectable authentic Thai, Asian and European cuisines. With sweeping views of the Chao Phraya River, The Garden and Mezzanine Bar offer a wide range of wine and cocktails. Room service is available upon request.

name: ibis Bangkok Siam
description: Located in the heart of downtown Bangkok, ibis Bangkok Siam is just steps away from the convenience of the BTS SkyTrain National Stadium station and the airport rail link. Guests are in walking distance to some of the city's best shopping malls, including MBK, Siam Paragon and Siam Discovery. The modern and comfortable pet friendly hotel offers great value rooms with a cozy bed, LCD TV and free WiFi, all complemented by warm friendly service.accorhotels.com

name: Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok
description: Luxurious stays await at Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok, with multiple pools situated within landscaped grounds. Featuring a direct access to Siam Paragon shopping centre, This resort-style hotel boasts free WiFi, fine dining and a world-class spa. Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok enjoys easy access to Siam BTS Skytrain Station through Siam Paragon Mall. Suvarnabhumi International Airport is about 24 km from the hotel. The spacious rooms at Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok are contemporary and stylish. Each comes with tea/coffee making facilities with an electric kettle and a flat-screen TV with international channels, while certain rooms provide a pool access. Complimentary soft drinks and local beer are available from the minibar. En suite bathrooms have slippers, free toiletries and a bath or shower. Siam Kempinski boasts 3 restaurants offering an international buffet breakfast, modern Thai cuisine and and all-day dining.
